'''Magical Forest Hut''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=90}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 16h
|Cypress Wood = 12
|Fabric = 12
|sort = Cypress Wood;Fabric
}}
